trade.title: Trade assets
twap.title: Trade options
twap.desc: Achieve lower slippage by splitting your trade in smaller chunks.
twap.warn.changeSlippage: Split trade likely to fail due to slippage - please adjust your slippage settings or reduce trade size.
twap.warn.useDca: Your trade may be too large for efficient Split Trade execution - please try our DCA page or increase slippage to ensure successful execution.
twap.error.minOrderSize: Your order size is too small for price optimization.
twap.error.maxOrderSize: Your order size is too big for price optimization. Use OTC or DCA instead.
trade.settings.title: Trade settings
trade.settings.slippageInfo1: Here you can control the maximum allowed deviation between your desired price and the actual execution price.
trade.settings.slippageInfo2: Such deviation can be caused by protocol fees, price impact (trade size vs liquidity), or price changes due to trading activity.
trade.settings.maxRetries.label: Max retries
trade.error.balance: Your trade is bigger than your balance.
trade.error.insufficientTradingAmount: Your order size is lower than the minimum for trading.
trade.error.maxOutRatioExceeded: Your order size exceeds the trading limit, please split your trade.
trade.error.maxInRatioExceeded: Your order size exceeds the trading limit, please split your trade.
trade.error.invalidPair: Selected pool pair is not valid
tx.failedText: Unfortunately there was an issue while submitting your transaction. Please change your fee payment asset or try again later.
tx.submittedText: Your transaction has been submitted successfully.
xcm.title: Cross-chain
xcm.error.notEvmAddr: The address is incorrect. Please use valid ethereum address.
xcm.error.notNativeAddr: The address is incorrect. Please use valid polkadot address.
xcm.error.notValidAddr: The address is incorrect. Please review it and try again.
xcm.error.balance: Your transfer is bigger than your balance.
xcm.warning.cex: Transferring assets to CEX through XCM directly will result in loss of funds. Please send them to your address on the relevant network first.
xcm.warning.ledger: If using a Ledger hardware wallet, please transfer funds to a hot wallet before sending to HydraDX network.
chart.title: Trade chart
dca.title: Trade DCA
dca.form.title: DCA settings
dca.settings.title: Dca settings
dca.settings.slippageInfo1: Tolerated price deviation from the last known price. Trade will be rescheduled if the price changes more than the specified percentage since previous block or 10 block average.
dca.error.frequencyOutOfRange: The valid frequency is between {{min}} and {{max}} minutes.
yDca.title: Yield DCA
yDca.howto.title: How it works
yDca.howto.descr: Diversify your yield from staked DOT
yDca.howto.step1.title: Send your DOT to Bifrost
yDca.howto.step2.title: Stake DOT to get vDOT
yDca.howto.step2.descr: You can mint vDOT using the
yDca.howto.step3.title: Send vDOT to HydraDX
yDca.howto.step4.title: Schedule your Yield DCA
yDca.howto.step4.descr: Select the asset you want to accumulate, and the overall duration. By placing the order you schedule at least one trade per 24h which swaps the staking yield (appreciation of vDOT) into the asset of your choice.
